title: Chrome Remote Desktop
author: LucaBianco
body_snippet:
How do I use **Chrome Remote Desktop** with mRemoteNG?

The Idea is to use HTTPS and acces the webpage https://remotedesktop.google.com/access.

I saw another issue on the matter:
https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/1167

And a pull request to solve the problem:
https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/pull/1690
Which I guess has been discarded and never merged.

Is there another way?

## Expected Behavior
Load https://remotedesktop.google.com/access

## Current Behavior...

comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
comments.author: robertpopa22
